event.title: Auto garage in Qatar
event.description: Finding the right mechanic can save your car from incurring additional repairs and saving your costs. Only go for approved car mechanics. Best way is to find the AAA approved auto repair team. Or you can look for ASE approved or manufacturer certified mechanics that have great expertise dealing with a specific model. Online ratings and reviews can help to a certain extent.Before even handing your car over to the garage, research how much a repair will cost. If you could find out what needs to be done, itâ€™s easy to make a fair deal with the mechanics. Before they start working ask for a written quote which include parts cost, labor charge and tax.And make sure you always prefer to choose genuine car spare parts in Doha.If you are looking to replace your standard parts. This can save a great deal of money in the long run.
